721631f-a.title: Manhattan: Market Street - Madison Street
721631f-a.text:
Market Street, east side, north from Madison, to and including Henry
Streets. The Manhattan Bridge is seen in the background.
September 9, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
721631f-a.folder: Market Street & Madison Street, Manhattan, NY

721536f-a.title: Manhattan: Madison Street - Market Street
721536f-a.text:
Madison Street, north side, west from and including Market, to, but
not including Catherine Streets.
March 9, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
721536f-a.folder: Madison Street & Market Street, Manhattan, NY

721537f-c.title: Manhattan: Madison Street - Market Street
721537f-c.text:
(1)
Madison Street, west from and including Market Street, as seen
from the Manhattan Bridge and showing a general view of the down-
town business district, with the Municipal Building on the right.
June 8, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(W) he same, from a different angle.
July 9, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(3)
The same, but showing a wider view of the skyline of lower New
York.
September 24, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
721537f-c.folder: Madison Street & Market Street, Manhattan, NY

721630f-a.title: Manhattan: Market Street - Madison Street
721630f-a.text:
Market Street, west side, north from Madison, to and including Henry
Streets. In the background is shown the Manhattan Bridge.
March 9, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
721630f-a.folder: Market Street & Madison Street, Manhattan, NY

721540f-a.title: Manhattan: Madison Street - Market Street
721540f-a.text:
134 Madison Street, south side, between Market and Pike Streets, show-
ing a garage for the Department of Sanitation under construction by the
W.P.A. This, a northward view from the interior of the plot shows the
rears of buildings numbered 148 to 154 Madison Street.
August 12, 1936.
W.P.A. Photo.
Federal Art Project.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.
721540f-a.folder: Madison Street & Market Street, Manhattan, NY

721541f-a.title: Manhattan: Madison Street - Market Street
721541f-a.text:
134 Madison Street, south side, between Market and Pike Streets, showing
W.P.A. employees excavating for a new garage. The rear and side views
shown, are of No. 14S, a 3-story structure and its rear component.
May 14, 1936.
W.P.A. Photo.
Federal Art Project.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.
721541f-a.folder: Madison Street & Market Street, Manhattan, NY

721542f-a.title: Manhattan: Madison Street - Market Street
721542f-a.text:
134 Madison Street, south side, between Market and Pike Streets,
showing W.P.A. employees constructing a garage under the Manhattan Bridge.
September 3, 1936.
W.P.A. Photo.
Federal Art Project.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.
721542f-a.folder: Madison Street & Market Street, Manhattan, NY

721539f-a.title: Manhattan: Madison Street - Market Street
721539f-a.text:
134 Madison Street, south side, between Market and Pike
Streets, showing the completed Department of Sanitation garage
constructed by the W. P. A.
View 1: Feb. 10, 1937
View 2: Mag. 3, 1937
W. P. A. Photo
Five Boroughs Project
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE
